summary: Provides functionality to load, parse, manipulate, and persist subject vocabularies stored in SKOS/RDF files, exposing a corpus interface that manages concepts, their preferred and alternative labels, language information, and supports saving modifications back to SKOS format.
business_intent: Allows the system to work with standardized controlled vocabularies for subject indexing and recommendation, enabling import of external SKOS resources and export of curated vocabularies for downstream text classification tasks.
